desc: Clarity Coffee Roasters, LLC in Bowling Green, KY offers freshly-roasted specialty coffee. We roast to order in small batches so your coffee will arrive to you at peak freshness. You can also rest assured that our coffee is ethically sourced from farms around the world.

layout.text: Offering small batch, freshly roasted coffee.  We roast to order, so your coffee will arrive to you fresh and full of flavor.
